name: DeleteSuggestion
description: This endpoint deletes a chosen SKU suggestion. Only one SKU should be deleted per request. This request cannot be undone. A workaround to revert its action, is to send the suggestion again, through the Send Suggestion API.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

sellerId.description: A string that identifies the seller in the marketplace. This ID must be created by the marketplace and informed to the seller before the integration is built.

sellerSkuId.description: A string that identifies the SKU in the marketplace. This is the ID that the marketplace will use for future references to this SKU, such as price and inventory notifications.
